subtitle: Hello everyone just a quick video to share a resource from a friend I made recently who
is a Gnostic who shares the Gnostic teachings... As you know if you follow
this channel a lot of what I talk about is based from, or inspired by, or influenced from
the Gnostic teachings and also more specifically by the master Samuel Aun Weor. Now I'd love to
just share this Gnostic resource with you right away but I also want to invite the right people
you know if you go deep into any religion or school there is always a next level of teachings
given when the student is ready; a secret set of instructions for the practitioner to follow, in the
same spirit I have to tell you some of the main things that are required so you can judge whether
it's right for you to join this sort of Gnostic group or not, so don't skip to the end of the video
but consider everything I'm saying first - it's in your best interest... so these teachings are deep and
so if you already feel this isn't for you or have any doubts while you listen to this just stop
watching the video now or at any point okay you know the Gnostic movement has never cared about
having lots of people or followers or subscribers it has always preferred one serious student over
a thousand half-hearted students okay so with that let me go over the, you could say, 'conditions' for
joining... conditions in the sense that you at the minimum accept understand or even better practice
to whatever degree the following four principles number one -- deep meditation, this means that you
somewhat understand the necessity of meditation in order to awaken consciousness you also understand
that 10 to 15 minutes of meditation a day just doesn't cut it ~ that whether you practice it or not
you understand that one hour or two hours or even higher than three hours a day is much
more ideal if you really want to awaken number two psychological death this means that you somewhat
understand the necessity of the total annihilation of the ego, now I know some people will
usually comment and say "well I believe I should keep some parts of my ego because it's good for me
and I can function better in the world etc." look that's fine, this is probably not for you,
I'm not saying you're wrong but anyone who has seriously worked on dissolving the ego
tends not to say anything like that because they understand how sly and tricky the nature of the
ego is and it's terrible multiplicity within the web of our subconscious mind... a proper student
would always stress the importance of total disciplined psychological comprehension that leads
to the dissolution of the ego, okay principle three; sexual transmutation -- or what we call a Gnosticism
suprasexuality, this means that you somewhat understand the importance of White Tantra; that is
the total avoidance of genital orgasm in order to create a permanent cultivation of sexual energy in
regards to your spiritual awakening, if you don't know what I'm talking about here see my episode on
sexual transmutation and also the episode on the sacral chakra episode, and also one
of the most important parts of transmutation is related to something that I've not yet mentioned
on my channel which is the very last principle, number four -- the creation of the solar astral body
and the death of the lunar astral body ~ now I've never talked about this explicitly
because it's something very esoteric right, it's not exoteric meaning, it's something the
general public will not understand, even in astral projection or out-of-body experience communities,
name the biggest names in the industry like Robert Monroe, William Buhlman etc. I guarantee
most of them don't understand or have never heard of the difference between the solar astral body
and the lunar astral body again this is esoteric knowledge, occult knowledge, in order to understand
it fully one must practice it fully - it is very hard to understand just from words and even from
how i'm about to describe it, so to try and just describe it for you, firstly - as we are; unconscious
beings with about 97% of our consciousness asleep bottled up in the world of the subconscious
we are lunar people, meaning like the moon; we take a projection of pure light from the Sun,
pure consciousness, and twist it into something else; into 97% fantasies of the ego, now the lunar
astral body is what most of us use and it's what we're born with and it's what we use after the
death of the physical body, now the problem with the lunar astral body is that it is based in the
ego and that makes it difficult to use in a conscious way, in the full sense of the word
conscious, on the other hand the solar astral body is something we don't have but something we create,
we cultivate, and develop, and it is not about using the light of the ego but using the direct
light of the sun that is becoming a being of pure light ourselves a truly illuminated awakened human
being who generates their own light from within, not like the moon, which doesn't have its own 'Light',
right now with the lunar astral body we say things like "oh last weekend I had an amazing spiritual
experience", or "oh last year I had a life-changing out-of-body experience"... that's all great
but to talk frankly what does it matter if we had some great experiences yesterday or 10 years ago?
What we care about is; what are you experiencing right now? What kind of consciousness have you
become right now? Are you asleep... dreaming about spiritual experiences?... or are you an awakened being
who has become a living embodiment of experience of knowledge... of Gnosis, from moment to moment...
and where are you going from here regardless of your experiences? Are you able to astral
project every single night or whenever you like or are you just hoping for experiences
every now and then?... So the solar astral body is about developing a permanent awaken state,
a permanent center of gravity with full control and cognizance over our inner faculties, over our
astral body, just like how the masters are... and what is one of the core principles in the Gnostic
teachings in attaining this? It is found in the third point I just spoke about; sexual
transmutation, for it is in sex we were born and sex where we can be reborn ~ reborn from the seed
that germinates through practice consistent disciplined practice where we never fall,
never make mistakes, never make errors, and this endows us over time with the solar forces through
the sexual glands and the endocrine system... to use a nice reference Gurdjieff summarizes this aspect
very well in the quote on the screen, which is about how we constantly add 'salt'; which is the
product of sexual alchemy, or 'Sahaja Maithuna', and that by creating a controlled surplus of this
energy literally creates our legitimate astral body, our permanent almost material astral body,
okay so I don't expect everyone to understand this as I said this is a spiritual mystery to
be studied those who have had a sincere desire to understand my work on this youtube will have
followed my recommendations to see the links and resources that I've left in many of my videos
and they would have looked into specific Gnostic resources I've given and will somewhat understand
all four of these principles and how they connect... if you are one of those people and you love
these principles then you are free to use this resource that I am about to give most of us when
looking for spiritual teachings either look for entertainment or comfort and to be soothed right
in some way... but if you're looking for something not entertaining, not easy, not comforting, but want
something difficult challenging and that goes to the core of real awakening and you want to
feel the benefits of disciplined, upright, conscious self-sacrificing efforts and you feel you're ready
for that level of intensity and your spiritual awakening then join and work through the material,
if you have no intention of working through the material or you're just merely interested on an
intellectual level instead of living the material honestly it's not really worth you joining because
it can in a way sometimes cause more harm than good because you know; you read the teachings and
because you're not practicing then you may wallow in self-pity because your ego says things like,
"oh this is too hard, I'm not ready, I'm useless, I'm worthless, etc" and obviously those kinds of
thoughts serve no purpose other than to detriment our suffering even more right, which is the
opposite of what we want to achieve, so my point is if you are not ready to practice the material,
because most of it is practical, then it is very difficult to control the mind and stop it from
telling you these negative thoughts that hurt your self-esteem because the interested part in
you wants to do it and the practical part of you doesn't want to do it and that creates conflict,
and that's just not what we want right... okay so with all of this in mind this resource is actually
in the form of a Telegram group so if you'd like to join you'll need to download the Telegram app
which is on mobile and desktop; I'll leave links in the description below and in this group there's no
talking from the members but just where my very kind Gnostic friend posts daily Gnostic teachings
there in a sequential and bite-sized form for you to read each day... you see this is commonly how the
Gnostic teachings are spread through someone who is you know practicing the material in a serious
way and able to communicate it to everyone in this kind of era that we're in so that it is
relatable and easier for us to comprehend all of this very deep material, and so yes he posts
all of this information and it's all just really powerful to read and meditate on every day, if you
join be sure to see the pinned messages which will take you to the first posts and then work your way
down through the content. Near the top you'll also see a little introduction from my friend there too
where he also includes his own astral experience with the master Samael Aun Weor
who essentially told him, in his own way, to create this app to help people... so yes eventually he will
be putting all of this information into an app which I've previewed and looks great, it will also
have the teachings in spoken word audio format too and yes, this official Gnostic app will be released
in a few months he said but in the meantime there are these daily teachings on there (Telegram) and they're
something that I personally follow too so we'll all be reading together for the few of you who
choose to join, okay well all of the links are in the description below - I could have
just told you that at the start but I wanted you to listen to me first ~ okay so yes this is just
a very good resource to really understand the Gnostic teachings in a more clearer way,
a more contemplative way, and yes I hope you enjoy, thanks everyone and see you on the next episode.
